messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

rejected rejected hi please raise ticket for below request thank you kind regards sent thursday re rejected dear would you be kind help she receives error when trying change natural thank you best regards compliance sent thursday re rejected inputs error introduce communication specialist sent thursday re rejected ca sa ne la thank you best regards compliance sent thursday rejected importance high sa sa rejected ca si inca rejected please help understand communication specialist
